Ihe ncheta osisi Agia ma ọ bụ Ihe ncheta osisi Agiya dị na saịtị nke osisi Agia (Egun: Asisoe Tin) bibu na nso Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo Badagry. Osisi Agiya bụ osisi dị otú narị na iri isii dị omimi (49 m) na gburugburu nke 30 feet (9.1 ). N'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama maka ịbụ osisi nke Thomas Birch Freeman na Henry Townsend kwusara Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na Naijiria na September 24, 1842, osisi ahụ dịrị ndụ ihe karịrị afọ 300 ruo mgbe oké ifufe gburu ya na June 20, 1959.
N'ọnọdụ ebe osisi ahụ, nwere n'ebe e guzobere obelisk N'afo 2012 iji mee ememe afọ otu narị iri asaa nke Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na Naịjirịa.
